_sText:
de_vast by DarkMortar
_____________________

This map takes place in a un-real city that contains
a refinery, a hotel, roads, and a overpass. This map supports 
32 players. This small and simple layout creates frantic fire-
fights within the dark tunnels and the outside of the hotel.

This level may cause quite a bit of lag and/or stress on the 
video card. It is recommended you lower your settings in 
intense multi-play. This map has bot support yet they do not 
use all the paths well and are predictable. They may also get 
stuck at the windows of the hotel.

This map also contains custom soundscapes which will make you feel like you are really there. 

Most of all, have fun.

DarkMortar.
